column5: Hi there i am trying to get help for my brothers they are up on canning lake and are having no luck. Does anyone have any ideas on what to use and where to use it . Even when i am not on the lake i still like to be a part of the action Thanks Rob
What are they fishing for? The Bassmania classic was just up there last weekend, so the bass got hit pretty hard. It's a so-so walleye lake, and slow for musky.
They have been trying it all what would be the best baits /lures for any . thanks
I know folks have been finding smallies deep (30') with heavy tube jigs on Canning and Kashagawigamog.
